    Boston bars see booming business in snow storm

    Some local bars enjoyed extra — and earlier — business from people who were snowed out of work or school today. (1:28 p.m.)

    Boston archdiocese says worshipers can miss Mass due to storm concerns

    The Boston archdiocese today urged Catholics to heed public safety warnings and only try to attend Sunday Mass if they can get to church safely. (10:12 a.m.)
